title: A Lot To Learn
detail_text: <:th_ch0102/>Umm.... Is it like this?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Yes, you’re doing well. Now, try turning your wrist like this while focusing on your fingertips....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Waaah, each of your movements is so beautiful, Shioriko-chan. Japanese traditional dance is really hard, huh....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>No, how you’re able to do it this well for your first time is amazing in its own right. I guess the rest comes with getting used to it.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Yeah, there’s no other way than to just practice it over and over again, right? Thank you, Shioriko-chan.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Don’t mention it, I’m glad if I could be of help. I was really surprised at first when you said you wanted to learn Japanese traditional dance, Riko-san.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Ehehe, I want my dance for the new song to look graceful down to my fingertips. So I was thinking maybe I could learn something from traditional dance.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>With that, I’ve also asked Eli-san to teach me ballet next time. I wanted to incorporate everything I can, no matter how little.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>I need to learn from your dedication towards your performance, Riko-san. Umm, if you don’t mind, may I also join Eli-san’s ballet class?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0102/>Sure, I think she wouldn’t mind. I’ll let her know. Let’s do our best together!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
